biblioteca.editorialNote: The works are under editorial review. They are published in their current state to facilitate access to knowledge while the professional editing process is completed. We appreciate your understanding.

economia_vs_ciencia.title: Is Economics a Science?
economia_vs_ciencia.description: Dialogue between Mauricio Rivadeneira and ChatGPT-4 about the scientific nature of economics

academicInvitation.title: Invitation to the Academic Community
academicInvitation.greeting: Dear colleagues, professors and students of economics and related sciences:
academicInvitation.intro: As a physicist and economist, I have developed research that proposes a rigorous experimental approach to economics, seeking to transform it into a true experimental science.
academicInvitation.platform: This platform (corpherejiaeconomica.com) contains my theses, books, conferences and dialogues with artificial intelligence about economics, available in six languages thanks to Claude AI support. While automatic translations are not perfect, they make the content accessible to a global audience.
academicInvitation.invitation: I invite you to explore these arguments and consider whether they offer valuable perspectives for rethinking the foundations of economic theory.
academicInvitation.dialogues: The AI dialogues you will find here can serve as a starting point for deeper academic debates.
academicInvitation.closing: This project has been developed with limited resources but with scientific conviction. I thank you in advance for your time and intellectual openness.
